entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts and is known for being strict. He is described as 'white with rage' in the text.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is a student at Hogwarts and is mentioned as making a comment about Snape.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a student at Hogwarts and is mentioned as making a comment about Snape.

entities.name: snivelly
entities.description: Snivelly is a student at Hogwarts and is mentioned as having his pants taken off by James.

relationships.description: James's comment about Snape makes him angry.
Sirius teases Snape by saying he thinks James is conceited.
James takes off Snivelly's pants, humiliating him in front of others.
Snape is angry with Harry for not stopping James from taking off Snivelly's pants.
